alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lewis and Clark and northern Jefferson Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Basin, or 13 miles west of Boulder, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boulder, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Corbin, Jefferson City and Elkhorn State Park. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 144 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
